title: Class Assignment - 27th Letter of the Alphabet
content:
This is a new letter form our group designed for an assignment in Typography I. This letter form is shown in both upper and lower case and presented in Baskerville Old Face.

This letter form is a substitute for the "-ing" sound as found in, "shoppING" or  
"goING".

Enjoy.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [letter\_ing.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417115030/http:/typophile.com/files/letter_ing.pdf) | 218.51 KB |
author: IngGroup

comments.content: Not that this diminishes your project at all, but your letter already exists. It's called [Eng](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417115030/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eng_(letter)).
